data.name: SokoChess Demo
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Polish, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
